title: General Education Requirements: Thinking Matters
instructions: Enter the Thinking Matters course which you have been assigned.

title: General Education Requirements: Ways of Thinking / Ways of Doing
instructions: Enter the WAYS-satisfying courses which you plan to take. Note: Each course must be a minimum of 3 units and taken for a letter grade.

section.instructions: Two courses in Aesthetic and Interpretive Inquiry (AII)
Two courses in Scientific Method and Analysis (SMA)
One course in Applied Quantitative Reasoning (AQR)

title: General Education Requirements: Writing and Rhetoric
instructions: Enter the two Writing and Rhetoric courses which you have been assigned.

section.instructions: Enter your PWR 1 course here (typically taken during freshman year).
Enter your PWR 2 course here (typically taken during sophomore year).

title: General Education Requirements: Language
instructions: You are required to complete one year of college-level study (or the equivalent) in a foreign language.

section.instructions: Enter one-year's worth of foreign language courses. Note: You can skip this section if you tested out of the foreign language requirement.
